      • dispose

        public void dispose​()
        Description copied from class: AbstractEntity
        Deletes the object from the map and every other container. The opposite to spawn() but also sets a flag to remove it completely.
        Overrides:
        dispose in class AbstractEntity
        See Also:
        AbstractEntity.shouldBeDisposed(), AbstractEntity.removeFromMap()
